Rule:
1. All abstracts with mentions of competitors
2. Abstracts with tumor types in combination with client specified genotypes
3. Abstracts mentioning K(RAS) mutant + tumor types.
4. All abstracts with mentions of research keywords.
Exclude KRAS/RAS wild type abstracts
1. All abstracts with mentions of genotypes\n2. Abstracts mentioning (K)RAS wild type + tumor type.
